info.title: Wait Wait Don't Tell Me Stats API
info.description:
Wait Wait Don't Tell Me Stats API provides endpoints to query data for Not My
Job Guests, Show Hosts, Recording Locations, Panelists, Scorekeepers, and
Shows.

Source code for this application is available on
[GitHub](https://github.com/questionlp/api.wwdt.me_v2).

get.summary: Retrieve Information for All Not My Job Guests
get.description:
Retrieve All Not My Job Guests.

Returned data: Guest ID, name and slug string.

Guests are sorted by guest name.

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Not My Job Guest ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Not My Job Guest by Guest ID.

Returned data: Guest ID, name and slug string.

schema.title: The ID of the guest to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Guest Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve a Not My Job Guest by Guest Slug String.

Returned data: Guest ID, name and slug string.

schema.title: The slug string of the guest to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances for All Not My Job Guests
get.description:
Retrieve Details for All Not My Job Guests.

Returned data: Guest ID, name, slug string, appearances and scores.

Guests are sorted by guest name. Appearances are sorted by date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances by Not My Job Guest ID
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Not My Job Guest by Guest ID.

Returned data: Guest ID, name, slug string, appearances and scores.

Appearances are sorted by date.

schema.title: The ID of the guest to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances for a Random Not My Job Guest
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest.

Returned data: Guest ID, name, slug string, appearances and scores.

Appearances are sorted by date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances by Guest Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Not My Job Guest by Guest Slug String.

Returned data: Guest ID, name, slug string, appearances and scores.

Appearances are sorted by date.

schema.title: The slug string of the guest to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information for a Random Not My Job Guest
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest.

Returned data: Guest ID, name and slug string.

get.summary: Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest ID.

Returned data: Guest ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Not My Job Guest Slug String.

Returned data: Guest slug string.

get.summary: Retrieve Information for All Hosts
get.description:
Retrieve All Hosts.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string and gender.

Hosts are sorted by host name.

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Host ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Host by Host ID.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string and gender.

schema.title: The ID of the host to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Host Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve a Host by Host Slug String.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string and gender.

schema.title: The slug string of the host to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances for All Hosts
get.description:
Retrieve Details for All Hosts.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string, gender, and appearances.

Hosts are sorted by host name. Appearances are sorted by date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances by Host ID
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Host by Host ID.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string, gender, and appearances.

Appearances are sorted by date.

schema.title: The ID of the host to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances for a Random Host
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Host.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string, gender, and appearances.

Appearances are sorted by date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Appearances by Host by Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Host by Host Slug String.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string, gender, and appearances.

Appearances are sorted by date.

schema.title: The slug string of the host to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information for a Random Host
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Host.

Returned data: Host ID, name, slug string and gender.

get.summary: Retrieve a Random Host ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Host ID.

Returned data: Host ID.

get.summary: Retrieve a Random Host Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Host Slug String.

Returned data: Host slug string.

get.summary: Retrieve Information for All Locations
get.description:
Retrieve All Show Locations.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue and slug string.

Locations are sorted by venue name, city, and state.

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Location ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Show Location by Location ID.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue and slug string.

schema.title: The ID of the location to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Location Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve a Show Location by Location Slug String.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue and slug string.

schema.title: The slug string of the location to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Recordings for All Locations
get.description:
Retrieve Details for All Show Locations.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue, slug string and
recordings.

Locations are sorted by venue name, city, and state. Recordings are
sorted by show date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Recordings by Location ID
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Show Location by Location ID.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue, slug string and
recordings.

Recordings are sorted by show date.

schema.title: The ID of the location to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Recordings for a Random Location
get.description:
Retrieve a Random Location.

Returned data: Location ID, venue, city, state, slug string, and recordings.

Appearances are sorted by date.

get.summary: Retrieve Information and Recordings by Location Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Show Location by Location Slug String.

Returned data: Location ID, city, state, venue, slug string and
recordings.

Recordings are sorted by show date.

schema.title: The slug string of the location to get

get.summary: Retrieve Postal Abbreviations
get.description:
Retrieve All Postal Abbreviations.

Returned data: Postal abbreviations for states, provinces and
territoies.

Postal abbreviations are sorted alphabetically.

get.summary: Retrieve Information for All Postal Abbreviations
get.description:
Retrieve Details for all All Postal Abbreviations.

Returned data: Postal abbreviations for states, provinces and
territoies.

Postal abbreviations are sorted alphabetically.

get.summary: Retrieve Information for a Postal Abbreviation
get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Postal Abbreviation.

Returned data: Postal abbreviation, name of the state, province or
territory, and country.

schema.title: Postal Abbreviation to retrieve information

get.summary: Retrieve a Random Location ID
get.description:

Panelists are sorted by panelist name. Appearances are sorted by

get.description:
Retrieve Details for a Panelist by Panelist ID.

Returned data: Panelist ID, name, slug string, gender, statistics

Returned data: Panelist ID, name, slug string, gender, statistics

Appearances are sorted by date.

schema.title: The slug string of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Panelist Scores for Each Appearance by Panelist ID
get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Scores by Panelist ID.

Returned data: One array with show dates and one array with scores.

schema.title: The ID of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Panelist Scores for Each Appearance by Panelist Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Scores by Panelist Slug String.

Returned data: One array with show dates and one array with scores.

schema.title: The slug string of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Panelist Scores as Ordered Pairs for Scores and Number of Times It Has Been Earned by Panelist ID
get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Grouped Scores by Panelist ID.

Returned data: Array of two element arrays: one element with a score
and one element with corresponding score count.

schema.title: The ID of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Panelist Scores as Ordered Pairs for Scores and Number of Times It Has Been Earned by Panelist Slug String
get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Grouped Scores by Panelist Slug String.

Returned data: Array of two element arrays: one element with a score
and one element with corresponding score count.

schema.title: The slug string of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Panelist Scores as Ordered Pairs by Panelist ID
get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Scores as Ordered Pairs by Panelist ID.

Returned data: Array of two element arrays: one element with a show
date and one element with corresponding score.

schema.title: The ID of the panelist to get

get.description:
Retrieve Panelist Scores as Ordered Pairs by Panelist Slug String.

Returned data: Array of two element arrays: one element with a show
date and one element with corresponding score.

schema.title: The slug string of the panelist to get

get.summary: Retrieve Information for a Random Panelist

Retrieve All Pronouns.

Values are sorted by Pronouns ID.

get.summary: Retrieve Information by Pronouns ID
get.description:
Retrieve a Pronouns String by Pronouns ID.

get.summary: Retrieve Information for All Shows
get.description:
Retrieve All Shows.

Returned data: Show ID, date, Best Of flag, Repeat flag and NPR.org
show URL

Shows are sorted by date.

Retrieve all Best Of Shows.

Returned data: Show ID, date, Best Of flag, Repeat flag and NPR.org
show url

schema.title: Include repeat Best Of shows with Best Of shows

show URL

Returned data: Show dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

get.summary: Retrieve Detailed Information for All Shows
get.description:
Retrieve Details For All Shows.

Return data: Show ID, date, Best Of flag, Repeat flag or date,
NPR.org show URL, location, description, notes, host, scorekeeper,
panelists, Bluff information and Not My Job guests

Shows are sorted by date.
